Sat., Dec. 16: Join us in Shepherdstown for an exhibit and discussion of political cartoons exploring the First Amendment.
  

Dear ##first_name[Supporter]##,

Join us on Saturday, December 16 in Shepherdstown for an amazing pop-up exhibit of political cartoons exploring the First Amendment. The show features cartoons from some of the most respected cartoonists in the country, including numerous Pulitzer Prize winners.

Political Cartoon Exhibit
Saturday, December 16, 6-11 p.m.
123 W German St.
Shepherdstown, WV 25443
RSVP on Facebook or by email

The curator, renowned political cartoonist Gary Huck, will have an insightful Q&A with our Executive Director Joseph Cohen at 7 p.m. They will discuss cartooning, freedom of speech and the current environment for political artists. You won't want to miss this event!

Participating artists include Kirk Anderson, Clay Bennet, Paul Berge, John Cole, Edward Colley, Peter Dunlap-Shohl, Steve Greenburg, Ed Hall, Phil Hands, Gary Huck, Mike Keefe, Mike Konopacki, Jimmy Margulies, P.S. Mueller, Jack Ohman, Joel Pett, Ted Rall, Andy Singer, Scott Stantis, Signe Wilkinson and Matt Wuerker.

We hope to see you there!

Onward together,

ACLU of West Virginia
